column4: Hi all, I try to setup my TNT device Avermedia Avertv Volar HD Pro. I've done this tuto ; http://forum.ubuntu-fr.org/viewtopic.php?pid=8928491#p8928491  But it doesn't work.... Anybody could help me please ? Thank you !
you didnt read that tutorial then, did you not notice it *lists* what cards it'd work for?
did you check the ID of the device to make sure it matches?
